      • Bank

        public Bank(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players,
            Square[][] squares)
        This method is the Constructor method of the bank. This method initializes the companies and takes players and squares from the board.
        Parameters:
        players -
        squares -
        Requires:
        There is no requirement for this method.
        Modifies:
        companies, players, squares
        Effects:
        Bank is created and ready for the game.

    • Method Detail

      • thereIsUnownedProperty

        public boolean thereIsUnownedProperty()
        This method checks that there is unowned property in the bank or not

      • getUnownedProperties

        public java.util.ArrayList<SquareProperty> getUnownedProperties()
        This method returns all unowned properties to show to the user all options.
        Returns:
        Returns the ArrayList of SquareProperty objects whose owner null.
        Requires:
        There is no requirement for this method.
        Modifies:
        This method does not modify anything.
        Effects:
        Unowned properties will be returned as a list.

      • findHighestRentProperty

        public int[] findHighestRentProperty(int total)
        This method takes total number of dice thrown and finds the highest-rent property within the TRANSIT STATION rules.
        Parameters:
        total -
        Returns:
        Returns the array of integers with row and position of Square
        Requires:
        total must be the sum of numbers in dice, Mr. Monopoly and bus are counted as zero.
        Modifies:
        This method does not modifies anything.
        Effects:
        Highest-rent property's location in the board will be returned.

      • auction

        public java.lang.String[] auction(SquareProperty s,
                                  int[] bids)
        This method takes a property and bids from all players; finds highest bid; and sells the property to the player with highest bid.
        Parameters:
        s -
        bids -
        Returns:
        String array which includes status and message for GUI
        Requires:
        s must be unowned property, bids must be in the same order of players.
        Modifies:
        s, winner
        Effects:
        Selected property has sold to the player who makes the highest bid if max bid is greater than half of the actual price of property and player has the money that he offered, else nothing sold.

      • checkShareOfStocks

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> checkShareOfStocks()
        This method returns the list of names of companies that have at least one unsold share.
        Returns:
        Returns the ArrayList of String of Company names.
        Requires:
        There is no requirement for this method.
        Modifies:
        This method does not modifies anything.
        Effects:
        Names of Company objects whose share fields less than 5 will be returned.

      • buyStock

        public java.lang.String[] buyStock(java.lang.String name,
                                   Player p)
        This method takes a company name and player; and sells one share of that company to the player.
        Parameters:
        name -
        p -
        Returns:
        String array which includes status and message for GUI
        Requires:
        name must be one of the company names that have unsold share(s)
        Modifies:
        p, c
        Effects:
        One share of the company with given name has sold to the player if player has enough money, else nothing sold.

      • auctionStock

        public java.lang.String[] auctionStock(java.lang.String name,
                                       int[] bids)
        This method takes a company name and bids from all players; finds highest bid; and sells one share of that company to the player with highest bid.
        Parameters:
        name -
        bids -
        Returns:
        String array which includes status and message for GUI
        Requires:
        name must be one of the company names that have unsold share(s), bids must be in the same order of players.
        Modifies:
        c, winner
        Effects:
        One share of the company with given name has sold to the player who makes the highest bid if max bid is greater than half of the par value and player has the money that he offered, else nothing sold.
